moussaka.title: Moussaka
moussaka.Description: Indulge in the rich flavors of Greece with our classic Moussaka. Layers of eggplant, ground meat, and béchamel sauce, baked to perfection.

steps.step2: Brown ground meat with onions, garlic, and cinnamon.
steps.step3: Layer eggplant, meat, and tomato sauce, then top with béchamel sauce.
steps.step4: Bake until golden brown and serve.

souvlaki.title: Souvlaki
souvlaki.Description: Savor the essence of Greece with our Souvlaki. Skewers of marinated meat, grilled to perfection, served with pita and tzatziki sauce.

steps.step1: Marinate meat in olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, and oregano.
steps.step2: Thread meat onto skewers and grill until done.
steps.step3: Serve with warm pita bread and tzatziki sauce.

spanakopita.title: Spanakopita
spanakopita.Description: Delight in the taste of Greece with our Spanakopita. Flaky layers of phyllo dough filled with spinach, feta cheese, and herbs.

steps.step1: Sauté spinach, onion, and dill, then mix with feta cheese and egg.
steps.step2: Layer phyllo dough with spinach mixture, brushing with butter between layers.
steps.step3: Bake until golden brown and serve.

tzatziki.title: Tzatziki
tzatziki.Description: Enjoy the refreshing taste of Tzatziki. Creamy Greek yogurt, cucumber, garlic, and dill come together for a delightful dip or sauce.

steps.step1: Grate cucumber and squeeze out excess liquid.
steps.step2: Mix cucumber with yogurt, garlic, dill, lemon juice, and olive oil.
steps.step3: Season with salt and refrigerate before serving.

saganaki.title: Saganaki
saganaki.Description: Experience the flavors of Greece with our Saganaki. Pan-fried cheese served with a squeeze of lemon for a tangy delight.

steps.step2: Fry in olive oil until golden and crispy.
steps.step3: Squeeze lemon over the cheese and serve.

dolmades.title: Dolmades
dolmades.Description: Savor the Mediterranean flavors with our Dolmades. Grape leaves stuffed with a mixture of rice, herbs, and ground meat.

steps.step1: Blanch grape leaves and prepare filling with rice, meat, onion, dill, lemon juice, and olive oil.
steps.step2: Roll grape leaves around the filling and cook until tender.
steps.step3: Serve with a squeeze of lemon.

lamb_gyros.title: Lamb Gyros
lamb_gyros.Description: Indulge in the bold flavors of Greece with our Lamb Gyros. Thinly sliced marinated lamb, wrapped in pita bread with tomatoes, onions, and tzatziki sauce.

steps.step1: Marinate lamb in olive oil, garlic, and oregano.
steps.step2: Grill until done, then slice thinly.
steps.step3: Wrap lamb in pita bread with tomatoes, onions, and tzatziki sauce.

pastitsio.title: Pastitsio
pastitsio.Description: Enjoy a taste of Greece with our Pastitsio. Layers of pasta, seasoned ground meat, and creamy béchamel sauce, baked to perfection.

steps.step1: Cook pasta and layer with seasoned ground meat, tomato sauce, and béchamel sauce.
steps.step2: Bake until golden brown and sprinkle with cinnamon and nutmeg before serving.

koulourakia.title: Koulourakia
koulourakia.Description: Delight in Greek sweets with our Koulourakia. Butter cookies, shaped into twists or rings, with a hint of vanilla and sesame seeds.

steps.step1: Cream butter and sugar, then add egg and vanilla extract.
steps.step2: Mix in flour and baking powder to form a dough.
steps.step3: Shape into twists or rings, sprinkle with sesame seeds, and bake until golden.
